subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ales Kotalik and Drew Stafford scored shootout goals for Buffalo and goaltender Ryan Miller stopped both attempts against him as the Sabres defeated the Islanders, 4-3, on Saturday night.
snippet: Ales Kotalik and Drew Stafford scored shootout goals for Buffalo and goaltender Ryan Miller stopped both attempts against him as the Sabres defeated the Islanders, 4-3, on Saturday night.
